field.name: store
field.label: COM_LOCATION_VISITS_FORM_LBL_LOCATION_STORE
field.query: SELECT '' AS `id`, 'COM_LOCATION_VISITS_LOCATIONS_STORE_FILTER' AS `text` UNION (SELECT id as value, shop_name as text from #__outlets)

field.name: client_id
field.label: COM_LOCATION_VISITS_FORM_LBL_LOCATION_CLIENT_ID
field.query: SELECT '' AS `id`, 'COM_LOCATION_VISITS_LOCATIONS_CLIENT_ID_FILTER' AS `client_name` UNION (SELECT id as value, client_name as text from #__clients)
